2+1.sig_info: Each time Havok gains a Plasma Charge, from any source other than this ability he has a 25 to 50.01% chance to gain another one.

PASSIVE: Havok is Immune to all forms of Incinerate.
Havok’s mutation gives him +1600 Energy Resistance.
Havok Passively generates 2.5% of a Bar of Power each second.
Havok gains 25% less Power from landing and receiving Hits.
WHEN STRUCK BY CRITICAL HITS: Havok reduces the Opponent's Critical Damage Rating by 50%.
ALL ATTACKS: Havok’s Medium Attacks, Heavy Attacks, and Light combo ending attacks do not make Contact, and deal Energy Damage.
PLASMA CHARGES - PASSIVE: Havok generates a Plasma Charge every 5 seconds, and can have a maximum of 10 Plasma Charges.
While Power Locked Havok’s Plasma Charge generation increases to 2 Charges every 5 seconds.
Each time Havok receives Energy Damage or a Critical Hit he gains +1 Plasma Charge(s).
If affected by a Power Drain Havok loses all his Plasma Charges.
PLASMA BUILD UP - DEBUFF: When Havok would generate a Plasma Charge beyond his maximum, he instead places a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent. Plasma Build Ups last until removed by another ability.
If made to Bleed Havok puts a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
At 11 Stacks all Plasma Build Ups are Removed.
When a Plasma Build Up is removed, it detonates Passively causing 12.15 Energy Damage.
If a Plasma Build Up is removed due to a Purify effect its Passive Damage is increased to 32.4.
Champions with an Armor Up Buff, and Havok, receive no damage from this ability.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Convert 2 Plasma Charge(s) to 1 Prowess, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting until Havok's next Special Attack ends. Max 5 stacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Places a Feedback Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds, causing 4.05 Energy Damage over its duration, for each Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: If Havok has +7 Stacks of Prowess all hits of his Special Attacks become Unblockable.
Converts up to 5 Plasma Charge(s) into Passive Prowess Effects, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting for 13 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activating this Special Attack Havok gains a Overcharge Passive Effect for the next 9 seconds, granting +1 Plasma Charge(s) per second.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: +141.75 Attack as long as the Opponent doesn’t have an active Armor Up Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Convert all Plasma Charges into Prowess Passive Effects.
+32.4 Attack for each Plasma Charge converted.
Purifies all Plasma Build Ups on the Opponent.

2+2.sig_info: Each time Havok gains a Plasma Charge, from any source other than this ability he has a 25 to 50.01% chance to gain another one.

PASSIVE: Havok is Immune to all forms of Incinerate.
Havok’s mutation gives him +1650 Energy Resistance.
Havok Passively generates 2.5% of a Bar of Power each second.
Havok gains 25% less Power from landing and receiving Hits.
WHEN STRUCK BY CRITICAL HITS: Havok reduces the Opponent's Critical Damage Rating by 50%.
ALL ATTACKS: Havok’s Medium Attacks, Heavy Attacks, and Light combo ending attacks do not make Contact, and deal Energy Damage.
PLASMA CHARGES - PASSIVE: Havok generates a Plasma Charge every 5 seconds, and can have a maximum of 10 Plasma Charges.
While Power Locked Havok’s Plasma Charge generation increases to 2 Charges every 5 seconds.
Each time Havok receives Energy Damage or a Critical Hit he gains +1 Plasma Charge(s).
If affected by a Power Drain Havok loses all his Plasma Charges.
PLASMA BUILD UP - DEBUFF: When Havok would generate a Plasma Charge beyond his maximum, he instead places a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent. Plasma Build Ups last until removed by another ability.
If made to Bleed Havok puts a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
At 11 Stacks all Plasma Build Ups are Removed.
When a Plasma Build Up is removed, it detonates Passively causing 15.9 Energy Damage.
If a Plasma Build Up is removed due to a Purify effect its Passive Damage is increased to 42.4.
Champions with an Armor Up Buff, and Havok, receive no damage from this ability.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Convert 2 Plasma Charge(s) to 1 Prowess, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting until Havok's next Special Attack ends. Max 5 stacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Places a Feedback Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds, causing 5.3 Energy Damage over its duration, for each Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: If Havok has +7 Stacks of Prowess all hits of his Special Attacks become Unblockable.
Converts up to 5 Plasma Charge(s) into Passive Prowess Effects, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting for 13 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activating this Special Attack Havok gains a Overcharge Passive Effect for the next 9 seconds, granting +1 Plasma Charge(s) per second.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: +185.5 Attack as long as the Opponent doesn’t have an active Armor Up Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Convert all Plasma Charges into Prowess Passive Effects.
+42.4 Attack for each Plasma Charge converted.
Purifies all Plasma Build Ups on the Opponent.

Converts up to 5 Plasma Charge(s) into Passive Prowess Effects, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting for 13 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activating this Special Attack Havok gains a Overcharge Passive Effect for the next 9 seconds, granting +1 Plasma Charge(s) per second.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: +1960 Attack as long as the Opponent doesn’t have an active Armor Up Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Convert all Plasma Charges into Prowess Passive Effects.
+448 Attack for each Plasma Charge converted.
Purifies all Plasma Build Ups on the Opponent.

5+1.sig_info: Each time Havok gains a Plasma Charge, from any source other than this ability he has a 25.04 to 55% chance to gain another one.

PASSIVE: Havok is Immune to all forms of Incinerate.
Havok’s mutation gives him +1900 Energy Resistance.
Havok Passively generates 2.5% of a Bar of Power each second.
Havok gains 25% less Power from landing and receiving Hits.
WHEN STRUCK BY CRITICAL HITS: Havok reduces the Opponent's Critical Damage Rating by 50%.
ALL ATTACKS: Havok’s Medium Attacks, Heavy Attacks, and Light combo ending attacks do not make Contact, and deal Energy Damage.
PLASMA CHARGES - PASSIVE: Havok generates a Plasma Charge every 5 seconds, and can have a maximum of 10 Plasma Charges.
While Power Locked Havok’s Plasma Charge generation increases to 2 Charges every 5 seconds.
Each time Havok receives Energy Damage or a Critical Hit he gains +1 Plasma Charge(s).
If affected by a Power Drain Havok loses all his Plasma Charges.
PLASMA BUILD UP - DEBUFF: When Havok would generate a Plasma Charge beyond his maximum, he instead places a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent. Plasma Build Ups last until removed by another ability.
If made to Bleed Havok puts a Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
At 11 Stacks all Plasma Build Ups are Removed.
When a Plasma Build Up is removed, it detonates Passively causing 100.35 Energy Damage.
If a Plasma Build Up is removed due to a Purify effect its Passive Damage is increased to 267.6.
Champions with an Armor Up Buff, and Havok, receive no damage from this ability.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Convert 2 Plasma Charge(s) to 1 Prowess, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting until Havok's next Special Attack ends. Max 5 stacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Places a Feedback Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds, causing 33.45 Energy Damage over its duration, for each Plasma Build Up on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: If Havok has +7 Stacks of Prowess all hits of his Special Attacks become Unblockable.
Converts up to 5 Plasma Charge(s) into Passive Prowess Effects, each increasing Special Attack Damage by 10% and lasting for 13 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activating this Special Attack Havok gains a Overcharge Passive Effect for the next 9 seconds, granting +1 Plasma Charge(s) per second.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: +1170.75 Attack as long as the Opponent doesn’t have an active Armor Up Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Convert all Plasma Charges into Prowess Passive Effects.
+267.6 Attack for each Plasma Charge converted.
Purifies all Plasma Build Ups on the Opponent.
